title: Judge Me Boards
body:
**PERMANENTLY BANNED**

**YOUR CHAT LOGS**

**Game 1**
since nobody swapped dont complain when i do shit
you dont count
lol
i need you to land stun
aand rip top
that was your chance to catch up
so twitch could kill me?
yeah good idea focus leo
it was sarcasm
should have focused twitch
ur lane whatever bro
ig ima just shred towers
ww r?
oh fun
thx
gj on ur 4 too
the reason why theyre both so strong
gj
5
i can do it too
i dont play jg :)
thats why i begged for a lane swap
:)
fuckin moron
6
i was gold lmao
i mean
you're trading kills with a riven
oh look
your riv and ww blow me up instantly
wonder why that is
you lost us the game
0/1/1
shoulda given me adc
yw
4/7/0
or 0/3/2
HMMMMMM
.57 kda vs .66 kda
HMMMMM
7 kills at 18 mins nice
4/8
he literally started it lol
he already is obvs
thats bc they're super fed
wonder how they got fed
mf
wtf
you do 0 damage
look who has half our deaths
i mean
you literally inted him
ofc i cant do shit
you gave him 10 kills
like
how can you seriously try to argue
11
i started talking shit when jax said gj about me dying once
lmao
talks shit then whines in allchat when i talk back and he does bad
how?
you said "gj"
i didnt say anything
what a moron

replies.body: Meh. Would hate you on my team. You seem too insecure and eager to win an arguement with complete strangers in the middle of a match. Too much ego, no humility, petty.

Actually in 3 sentences I'm happier with what you said than entire conversation with support. I guess thanks because if I'm gonna get a permanent ban I at least want to feel like I somewhat deserved it.

> [{quoted}](name=iNStiNcT Nutmegg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=wKPg4yX7,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-01-19T01:06:39.283+0000)
>
> Actually in 3 sentences I'm happier with what you said than entire conversation with support. I guess thanks because if I'm gonna get a permanent ban I at least want to feel like I somewhat deserved it.

Mmmm perhaps not as insecure as I thought xD hahaha glad you took it well.

Can you posts those support tickets ?

Yes it was from this account

> [{quoted}](name=iNStiNcT Nutmegg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=wKPg4yX7,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-19T01:12:18.551+0000)
>
> Yes it was from this account

Thanks, again I ask can you post the support tickets ?
Sorry but I'd rather not post that and hear what people have to say from just the chat logs

> [{quoted}](name=iNStiNcT Nutmegg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=wKPg4yX7,comment-id=000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-19T01:27:27.608+0000)
>
> Sorry but I'd rather not post that and hear what people have to say from just the chat logs

That's fine, I asked because of you title...Judge me.... So k. GL
Edit: I double posted so self deleted this one.

Yep. You're harassing and shaming your teammates throughout those logs. If you had already received a 14-day ban, you were warned that your next punishment would result in a permanent ban, and this is indeed enough to trigger a punishment. Between negative behavior and a history of toxicity, this does reasonably trigger a perma.
You had a 14 day ban before?

Thats normal then.

That Chatlog wasnt really Permaworthy, but since you had a 14 Day before it was enough.

After a 14 Day Ban any form of Misbehaviour drops the ban Hammer

Only one game? yeah you were an ass but there wasn't anything perma worthy.

If you don't mind me asking when was the last punishment?

I don't know but I think it had to be at least 2-3 months
edit: and yes only one game

One game is all it takes if you haven't improved your behavior in the time since the 14-day ban. Having low level toxic behavior that gets reported but does not get punished can still result in you staying on thin ice even many months after the 14-day ban.

It sucks that you got perma'd and I'm sorry that happened, but it did happen for a reason. Undercutting your teammates like that even if they were being absolute shitters doesn't solve any of your problems, and here's why:

If your teammate is trolling you, they are harassing you to try to elicit a response from you. If you react, then you feed their behavior and let them know that what they did worked. If they know that it worked to accomplish their goal, then they are going to do it even more.

The much more effective strategy is to mute them and report them after the game. Riot will deal with them accordingly and you don't have to put yourself at risk of getting in trouble by trying to punish the other player yourself with retaliatory harassment. Plus you won't have to read their vitriol if you've muted them because anything else they say won't even be visible to you.

I would say a chat ban but not a perma ban seems kind of ridiculous keeps happening to me too havent been perma'd but I talked to a support agent last night who said that even if you dont say anything vulgar just arguing is enough to get you a ban.

>fuckin moron

if you had a 2 week ban before this game then there is no need to check the rest of the log since according to the rules those two words are plenty
While I see worse at least weekly, I think the problem was mostly calling someone a moron after so many punishments. By this point you probably shouldn't have called anyone anything to be safe.
